name: The Tomb of Horrors - Twine Edition
name_original: The Tomb of Horrors - Twine Edition
description: 'Tomb of Horrors - Twine Edition' is an adaptation of the classic Dungeons and Dragons module 'The Tomb of Horrors' as it appears in the 5th Edition supplement book 'Tales from the Yawning Portal' made in Twine - Sugarcube 2.31
